sentences.english: The issue remains that the other South-asian countries have the rights to claim these territories.
sentences.chinese: 南亚的其他国家也有权诉诸对南沙群岛的主权。

sentences.english: Chinese fishing boats in nansha islands vie throughout your generations of waters homework.
sentences.chinese: 中国渔船世世代代在南沙群岛万安滩海域作业。

sentences.english: The recovery of the Xisha and Nansha Islands is the major achievement during the anti-aggression war in China.
sentences.chinese: 收复西南沙群岛是中国反侵略战争胜利的重要成果。

sentences.english: Osmund chamomile has spread in Nansha zone, more attention would be paid to.
sentences.chinese: 薇甘菊在南沙地区已有蔓延迹象，应引起重视。

sentences.english: China holds indisputable sovereignty over Nansha Island.
sentences.chinese: 中国对南沙群岛拥有不可争辩的主权。

sentences.english: China enjoys indisputable sovereignty over the Nansha Islands and their adjacent waters.
sentences.chinese: 中国对南沙群岛及其附近海域拥有无可争辩的主权。

sentences.english: This is the case with virtually all the islands being disputed on Paracel and Spratly archipelagos.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有在西沙和南沙有争议的海岛都属于这种情况。

sentences.english: Disputes over the sovereignty of Nansha island have been a long-standing source of tension.
sentences.chinese: 在南沙岛屿主权争议一直是紧张的长期来源。

sentences.english: China has indisputable sovereignty over the Nansha Islands and their adjacent waters.
sentences.chinese: 中国对南沙群岛及其附近海域拥有无可争辩的主权。

sentences.english: Then by the Minister of the Interior Yu Cheng-hsien personally inspected the Nansha islands Taiping Island.
sentences.chinese: 而后由内政部部长余政宪亲自视察南沙岛太平岛。

sentences.english: Hand off our Spratlys and Paracels before it would be too late.
sentences.chinese: 交班南沙和西沙群岛我们面前的将是太晚了。

sentences.english: The site is located at Dongshan village in Nansha Street Office, Jin-gang town, Zhangjiagang City.
sentences.chinese: 遗址位于张家港市金港镇南沙街道办事处东山村内。

sentences.english: In October, Vietnamese troops fired upon a Philippine air force plane on reconnaissance in the Spratly Islands.
sentences.chinese: 十月，南沙越军向一驾侦察中的非绿饼空军飞机开火。

sentences.english: China has indisputable sovereignty over Nansha Islands and their adjacent waters.
sentences.chinese: 中国对南沙群岛及其附近海域拥有无可争辩的主权。
